rawContent:
RT @byron_auguste: YES. True for many today - and tragic, as "systems" of lifelong learning barely exist.

At bare minimum we will need:
- universal internship
- skills-based hiring
- rapid reskilling (ID/fill gaps)
- re-entry level jobs
- AI for human learning 

What else?
cc: @Gallup @OpptyatWork https://t.co/7t1CofT6Il
